text: Va onon [musrikon]-ro har kuco jofted, ʙikused va az on co [Makka], ki sumoro ʙerun kardaand, ʙerun kuned va fitna [kufru sirk] ʙadtar az qatl ast va ʙo onho dar kanori Mascid-ul-harom pajkor nakuned, magar in ki ʙo sumo dar on co ʙicangand. Pas, agar [dar on co] ʙo sumo cangidand, esonro ʙikused, [ki] sazoi kofiron cunin ast
